title: Env hardening: client/server separation, protect .env, and docs

steps: Ensure .env contains only client-side Vite variables; server secrets commented/removed.
Confirm .gitignore ignores .env and Git marks it assume-unchanged.
Run type-check: pnpm exec tsc -b (if deps installed) and app dev without throwing edge config error when streaming off.
With streaming on and valid Supabase client env, edge helpers construct base URL and do not fail fast.
